decision_conditions: The operations come within the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015, thereby not requiring planning permission.

This certificate provides confirmation that the development is lawful.  You should also check whether the development requires separate Building Regulation consent. Information is available on the Building Control webpages and the team is available between 9am and 10am Monday to Friday via 01708 432700.

Please note that this certificate is granted for the outbuilding to be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of 29 Nelmes Avenue and not for any trade or business nor as a living accommodation. Should business or living accommodation use be intended, an application for full planning permission must be applied for and permission granted before such use could occur. The use of outbuildings as living accommodation is not typically deemed acceptable therefore it is important the outbuilding is only used for the purposes as listed above.

You are informed that notwithstanding the drawing hereby approved, the scheme only relates to the outbuilding and no other development, in particular with respect to the part of the drawing indicating a side extension.
description: Certificate of lawfulness for construction of outbuilding to be used for recreational use only
